item.title: Resume
item.author: dave@petzel.email (David Petzel)
item.description: David Petzel, Systems Engineer website: http://www.dpetzel.info email: dave@petzel.email Summary Of Qualifications Extensive operational experience in organizations of all sizes. Driven self-starter who likes to learn new things and make existing things better. I’ve spent the last 5+ years providing operational support in a large scale and very complex environment. I have a strong desire to automate as much as possible, and take pride in ensuring things I do automate are well documented.
